QuestData.Title: The Librarian's Quandary
QuestData.Description: Lorewalker Stonestep is in charge of the entire temple library. Lately, something has been troubling him and his work.$B$BWith thousands of ancient tomes to be transcribed, I can't afford to have him distracted.$B$BWould you follow the path south to the library and see what ails him?
QuestData.LogDescription: Speak to Lorewalker Stonestep in the temple library.
QuestData.RewardText: The Elder Sage Rain-Zhu sent you?$B$BVery well. You shall help me.
